cab.content: DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)C.(63) 51 ^ COPY NO. 5215th March, 1963CABINETRAILWAYS BOARD REPORT:''THE RE-SHAPING OF BRITISH railways'Note by the Secretary of the CabinetMembers of the Committee on the Reorganisation of theRailways already have copies of the Railways Board's Report.Copies are circulated herewith to those members of the cabinet who are not members of the Committee.(Signed) BURKE trend cabinet Office, S. W. 1.15th March, 1963
